articles.description: If anti-lockdown protests were not worrying enough, now youngsters are organising ‘COVID-19’ parties to intentionally spread the virus.
articles.content:
Open defiance of lockdown and quarantine rules has become somewhat of a trend in many countries even as the coronavirus pandemic continues to kill thousands every day.
Young people around the world were seen hitting the beach, taking strolls in public places… [+1797 chars]
